Question: This person, already wealthy, declined the salary, since he valued his image as a selfless public servant.
Hints: At his death, this person was eulogized as "first in war, first in peace, and first in the hearts of his countrymen" by Henry Lee.
That year, an unsuccessful attempt was made to steal the body of this person.
On January 6, 1759, this person married the wealthy widow Martha Dandridge Custis, then 28 years old.
